Title: Hong Kong’s offshore LNG terminal enters service; sendout of first commercial cargo underway
Description: The 4 mtpa Hong Kong offshore LNG terminal has started operations, with the sendout of its first commercial cargo underway.
Author: CK

Title: Thailand’s EGAT seeks up to 1.2 mtpa of LNG for 2024-2027
Description: Thailand’s state-owned utility the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand, or EGAT, has issued a tender to buy up to 1.2 mtpa of LNG for delivery to Map Ta Phut in southern Thailand between 2024 and 2027. The tender closes on Aug. 10.
Author: CK

Title: Both trains offline at Ichthys LNG due to output issues, restart expected soon
Description: The Inpex-operated 8.9 mtpa Ichthys LNG plant in Australia’s Northern Territory is offline possibly due to production issues, which have led the operator to request deferrals of term cargoes by a few days.
Author: CK

Title: QatarEnergy expects to supply 40% of new LNG supplies by 2029
Description: QatarEnergy expects its LNG output to account for  40% of the new LNG supplies that will reach the market by 2029 when all its projects are online.
Author: CK

Title: NextDecade greenlights Rio Grande LNG project Phase 1; construction to begin
Description: US LNG project developer NextDecade has taken a positive final investment decision on the first phase of its 27 mtpa Rio Grande LNG project in Brownsville, Texas, and plans to begin construction of the facility.
Author: CK
